price: 112. Hij zei: “En wat voor kennis heb ik over dat wat zij deden?”
arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla wamā ʿil'mī bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
